byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Polish Amb reptd to have asked Allied declaration of conditions
snippet: LONDON, Feb. 2--The French Embassy in London delivered to the Foreign Office today a diplomatic document purporting to be an authentic neutral report of German atrocities in Poland....

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: OCCUPATION AND REHABILITATION OF CONQUERED AREAS

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: OCCUPATION AND REHABILITATION OF CONQUERED AREAS

headline.main: DEATHS IN POLAND PUT AT 5,000,000; Two Neutral Secret Service Men Said to Have Obtained Estimate From Gestapo VICTIMS DIE ALONG ROADS Hitler Accused in Report of Pursuing Systematic Plan of Extermination

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Feb. 2--The French Embassy in London delivered to the Foreign Office today a diplomatic document purporting to be an authentic neutral report of German atrocities in Poland.
